mapper.select: select id, img, nickname, username, tel, zipcode, road_name, addr, self_certification from user where id = #{param1}
select img from user where id = #{param1}
mapper.update: update user set password=#{password}, img=#{img}, nickname=#{nickname}, road_name=#{road_name}, addr=#{addr} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from user where id = #{param1} and password = #{param2}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.showdb_id, a.title, date_format(a.writedate, '%Y.%m.%e') writedate, b.genre from board a join showdb b on a.showdb_id=b.id where a.user_id = #{param1} order by a.id desc

select a.board_id, a.id, a.content, date_format(a.writedate, '%Y.%m.%e') writedate, c.genre from reply a inner join board b on a.board_id=b.id inner join showdb c on b.showdb_id = c.id where a.user_id = #{param1} order by b.id desc, writedate desc

select a.id, a.genre, a.name, date_format(b.showDate, '%Y.%m.%d') showdate, b.showTime, date_format(d.writedate, '%Y.%m.%e') writedate, c.seatcnt, d.no from showdb as a inner join scheduleDate as b on a.id=b.showdb_id inner join order_list as d on d.scheduleDate_id = b.id inner join seat as c on c.order_list_no=d.no where d.user_id=#{param1} order by b.showdate desc
